data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 346,328 people in the state of Nueva Esparta who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nueva Esparta, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 59,771 believers in Nueva Esparta to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Nueva Esparta.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Nueva Esparta, Venezuela.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Dutch people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Dutch people know you.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Nueva Esparta, Venezuela a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Nueva Esparta, Venezuela with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Nueva Esparta, Venezuela.
